changeSet.sql: create table UsmanTest1 ( id int primary key, name varchar(50) )

changeSet.author: Usman

changeSet.sql:
create table UsmanTest2 ( id int primary key, Email varchar(50)
)

changeSet.author: Usman
changeSet.context: alter table UsmanTest1 by Usman ul Haq
changeSet.sql: alter table UsmanTest1 add Address varchar(22)

changeSet.author: Usman
changeSet.context: alter table UsmanTest2 by Usman ul Haq
changeSet.sql: alter table UsmanTest2 add City varchar(22)

changeSet.author: Usman
changeSet.labels: Sp creation Get Data UsmanTest1 and UsmanTest2
changeSet.sql: Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sp_GetUsmanTest1AndUsmanTest2] select * from UsmanTest1 Union select * from UsmanTest2 End;
